content.rendered:
YAS

ABOUT

Yash Architectural Studio is a boutique interior design and architectural studio based out of Mysore.

SCOPE

  • Branding
  • Brand Identity

INDUSTRY

Interior Design - Service B2B/B2C

CHALLENGES

Da Vinci
 Would Be Proud

01

To incorporate the Vitruvian man into the design as the client was very specific about it.

02

To position YAS studios uniquely in a crowded market space of interior studios.

03

Deciding the right colour palette to suit the design style and enhance the entire identity of the brand.

04

It was challenging to recreate an artwork as legendary as the Vitruvian Man.

SOLUTION

Unique
To The Core

The logo design for Yash Architectural Studio is one of our most unique designs with a very specific requirement and inspiration – The Vitruvian Man.

Till We
Get It Right

IDENTITY

The Vitruvian Man by Leonardo Da Vinci explains the science of proportion via the human body. This design inspiration made the whole process interesting as well as challenging. The logo went into multiple iterations and changes till we were able to strike the right proportions.

IMPACT

A Striking Identity

YAS studios had a striking and different identity and unsurprisingly, everyone who came across the logo saw it with a sense of wonder and curiosity making the brand stand out.

Make The Move

LET'S COLLABORATE

REACH OUT

If you’re looking for a holistic agency to work on your big dream, just say the magic words!
LET'S COLLABORATE
